code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Container,TextField,Button,Typography,Box,Paper}from"@mui/material";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[roomId,setRoomId]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=()=>{if(username&&roomId){navigate(`/home/${username}/${roomId}`);}else{alert("Please enter both Username and Room ID");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{maxWidth:"xs",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:3,sx:{padding:4,marginTop:8,textAlign:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",gutterBottom:true,children:"Join Room"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",gap:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Username",variant:"outlined",fullWidth:true,value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Room ID",variant:"outlined",fullWidth:true,value:roomId,onChange:e=>setRoomId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:handleLogin,children:"Join"})]})]})});};export default Login;
